comments.author: hzbz@pm.me
comments.creator: hzbz@pm.me
comments.raw_text: From Limi, on Mac nightly build: After starting the browser, the first door hanger paints in several steps, and the arrow image at the top seems to be slowing it down, maybe it's not loaded up front. Subsequent opening is fast.

comments.raw_text: This is an important Snappy bug, set as P2 since it's not quite primary UI.
